acceptance.title: 7. Acceptance of Conditions
acceptance.description: The use of the application implies full acceptance of this contract.

object.description: This contract governs the use of the application by adopters, who access it to apply for the responsible adoption of animals managed by registered shelters.

platform_use.item_1: The adopter declares that the personal data provided is truthful and up-to-date.
platform_use.item_2: They commit to ensuring the well-being of the adopted animal.
platform_use.item_3: They accept that the verification of information and the final adoption decision correspond exclusively to the shelter.

data_protection.item_1: The adopter authorizes the processing of their data in accordance with Law 25.326 on Personal Data Protection.
data_protection.item_2: They may request the deletion of their personal data at any time.

liability_limitation.item_1: The application acts solely as a technological intermediary and does not guarantee adoptions.
liability_limitation.item_2: The development team is not responsible for disputes, breaches, or consequences arising from the adoption.

prohibited_conduct.item_3: Improperly use contact details of shelters or other users.

breach_consequences.item_1: Suspension or deletion of the account.

object.description: This contract regulates the use of the application by shelters, who use the platform to manage adoption processes and the publication of animals.

shelter_responsibilities.item_1: Verify the information provided by adopters.
shelter_responsibilities.item_2: Evaluate the adopter's commitment and make decisions on adoptions.
shelter_responsibilities.item_3: Ensure that the images and descriptions of animals uploaded to the platform do not infringe on third-party rights.

data_protection.item_1: The shelter authorizes the processing of its data in accordance with Law 25.326.
data_protection.item_2: It may request the deletion of its data at any time.

intellectual_property.item_1: The shelter retains ownership of the uploaded images and descriptions.
intellectual_property.item_2: It authorizes the application to display and process such data solely for the operation of the platform.

liability_limitation.item_1: The application acts as a technological intermediary, without guaranteeing adoptions or results.
liability_limitation.item_2: The development team is not responsible for conflicts with adopters or for the permanent availability of the service.

prohibited_conduct.item_2: Use adopter contact information for purposes other than the adoption process.
prohibited_conduct.item_3: Manipulate the adoption system in a way that compromises animal welfare.

breach_consequences.item_1: Suspension or deletion of the account.
